name: Witch Hunt (itch) (Bedo)
description:
The Great Witch has lost her sisters in mysterious ways, She is trying to find them and her cat has a remarkable skill finding stuff that has been lost, you play as this cat and your mission is to find the other witches' hats and bring them back to The Great Witch.

  • According to your platform, Download the suitable version, If you're playing on an android device then download the APK file, if you're playing on a PC then download the PCVersion.

Controls are simple:

PCMove > WASD
Jump > Space
Mobile Android
Move > Joystick
Jump > Press the bottom right side of your phone
